title: Баранкины и камни силы
overview: The Barankin family are hereditary drivers in the tenth generation. Every day they drive around Moscow and the Moscow region, deliver clients, and unusual stories happen to them. Superpowers help the Barankins to be everywhere and maintain a high rating in the taxi app. Representatives of this family can transform, stop time and even read minds. One day, Varvara Barankina, a city cab driver who started the Barankin family, is teleported from the past to the streets of modern Moscow. Now the family has to return the girl home and deal with the mysterious villain who has opened a hunt for her.
